text:
Anyone know if its possible to create SVG animations in Julia?

Bonus points if its compatible with plots made from Plots.jl

elements.text:
Anyone know if its possible to create SVG animations in Julia?

Bonus points if its compatible with plots made from Plots.jl

text:
GR.jl is the default backend for plots.jl, and does some animation (there are example notebooks)
this is good for some animations, dunno about SVG or Plots
<https://wikunia.github.io/Javis.jl/stable/>
